Honest review of Dandy Blend
Amazon.com: Dandy Blend
s: Dandy Blend is a coffee substitute and has no caffeine, is GMO free, Kosher, and vegan. This herbal tea is made from dandelion and chicory roots. Certified organic options are available. Dandy Blend looks like fine coffee granules and has no bitterness or acidity.
